name: Wild West Platformer
description:
This unique platformer combines shooting elements with the wild, wild west! With gun upgrades, laser bullets, and a whole lot of bandits, you will find this to be a fun and compelling experience. If you encounter a bandit, wall, or anything in your way, click to fire!

Important: You don't start with a gun, you have to pick one up by walking over it. There is one right next to you at the beginning, though.

For windows, unzip and run the .exe.

For Mac, run the app.

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to jump

Left click to fire
